H0.text: Films. Which Dominic starred as Merry (Meriadoc) in ‘The Lord of the Rings’. Dominic Purcell

H1.text: Films. Which Dominic starred as Merry (Meriadoc) in ‘The Lord of the Rings’. Dominic West

H2.text: Films. Which Dominic starred as Merry (Meriadoc) in ‘The Lord of the Rings’. Dominic Cooper

H3.text: Films. Which Dominic starred as Merry (Meriadoc) in ‘The Lord of the Rings’. Monghan

A4.text: He is best known for playing Meriadoc 'Merry' Brandybuck in Peter Jackson's film trilogy The Lord of the Rings (2001–2003), and Charlie Pace on the ABC television drama Lost (2004–2010).
